title: What happened to the LB complaints?
body: There were a ton of complaints about LB, with a focus on how she could W to melee range, toss a point-blank E, then W back and retain the tether link, as well as her burst potential. Now there's nothing. Her last nerf (W CD from 14→10 to 18→10) was nearly two months ago, but there were still LB complaints more recently than that, I think. What happened?

replies.body: People obsessed over Akali like she was actually relevant for anyone outside of LCS.
